accounts.name: keyAccount
docs: The account used as the key to lookup

accounts.name: metadataAccount
docs: The account containing the metadata for the key

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that must sign to make this change

accounts.name: payer
docs: The address paying the rent for the account

accounts.name: metadataAccount
docs: The account containing the metadata to change

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that must sign to make this change

accounts.name: metadataAccount
docs: The account containing the metadata to change

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that must sign to make this change

accounts.name: receiver
docs: The address receiving the rent

accounts.name: PositionTokenMetadata
docs: A metadata account referencing information about a position token

fields.name: positionTokenMint
docs: The mint for the position token

fields.name: underlyingTokenMint
docs: The underlying token represented by this position

fields.name: adapterProgram
docs: The adapter program in control of this position

fields.name: tokenKind
docs: Description of this token

fields.name: valueModifier
docs: A modifier to adjust the token value, based on the kind of token

fields.name: maxStaleness
docs: The maximum staleness (seconds) that's acceptable for balances of this token

accounts.name: TokenMetadata
docs: An account that references information about a token's price oracle

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The address of the mint for the token being referenced

fields.name: pythPrice
docs: The address of the price oracle which contains the price data for
the associated token.

fields.name: pythProduct
docs: The address of the pyth product metadata associated with the price oracle

accounts.name: MarginAdapterMetadata
docs: An account that references a program that's allowed to be invoked by
proxy via a margin account.

fields.name: adapterProgram
docs: The address of the allowed program

accounts.name: LiquidatorMetadata
docs: An account referencing a liquidator, allowed to use the liquidation
instructions on margin accounts.

types.name: TokenKind
docs: Description of the token's usage
